title: Best Baked Beans
ingredients: ['500g dried haricot beans, soaked in water overnight and drained', '1 (400g) tin chopped tomatoes', '3 rashers bacon, finely sliced', '3 tablespoons black treacle', '3 tablespoons dark brown soft sugar', '1 teaspoon mustard powder', '750ml water', '1 tablespoon sea salt', 'freshly cracked black pepper to taste']
